title: EVERYTHING IS GOING WRONG!! - One Piece Episode 403 & 404 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Various Reactors
description: Combined reaction and review covering episodes 403 and 404, capturing the emotional devastation of watching Zoro disappear and the Straw Hats' desperate situation.

title: One Piece BROKE ME Again! (Ep 404-405 REACTION)
author: Various Reactors
description: Emotional reaction covering episodes 404-405, focusing on the heartbreaking separation of the Straw Hat crew members.

title: THE FINALE OF THE ARC?! | One Piece Episode 404/405 Reaction
author: Various Reactors
description: Reaction focusing on the climactic conclusion of the Sabaody Archipelago arc as the crew is separated.

title: ONE PIECE WHY ARE YOU DOING THIS!! One Piece Episode 403 & 404 REACTION + REVIEW
author: Various Reactors
description: Combined reaction and review expressing the emotional devastation of the Sabaody arc conclusion.

title: 404: Admiral Kizaru's Fierce Assault! The Straw Hats Face Certain Death!
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr Blog)
description: Detailed episode analysis and commentary from a first-time watcher's perspective. Discusses Kuma's mysterious actions, Rayleigh vs Kizaru, Monster Chopper, and introduces the concept of 'Kuma's Law' - whenever Kuma appears, the plot takes unexpected turns.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: First-time watcher perspective, no future spoilers

title: Rayleigh Saves Zoro | Epic Battle in One Piece Episode 404
author: ramen.guy_
description: Short clip highlighting Rayleigh's dramatic entrance to save Zoro from Admiral Kizaru's execution attempt.

title: After 10 Years of Waiting, One Piece's New Cliffhanger Tees Up an Overdue Fight for Luffy
author: ScreenRant
description: Article discussing how the recent One Piece episodes set up a rematch between Luffy and Kizaru, calling back to their first encounter in the Sabaody Archipelago arc (Episode 404 era).

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for recent Egghead arc episodes

title: A guide to One Piece's Bartholomew Kuma
author: InBetweenDrafts
description: Comprehensive guide to Bartholomew Kuma's appearances throughout One Piece, including his pivotal role in Episode 404 where he begins separating the Straw Hats.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Kuma's full backstory and motivations

title: One Piece: Oda Finally Reveals Why Kuma Separated The Straw Hats On Sabaody
author: GameRant
description: Article explaining the revealed motivations behind Kuma's actions in Episode 404-405, discussing how he believed Luffy resembled Nika and wanted to help the crew prepare for the New World.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains major spoilers about Kuma's backstory and Nika/Gear 5 revelations

title: One Piece: Why Did Kuma Send Away the Straw Hats at Sabaody?
author: Beebom
description: Article analyzing Kuma's motivations for separating the Straw Hats in Episode 404-405, connecting it to the Revolutionary Army and his plan to help them grow stronger.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Kuma's true allegiance and later story revelations
